author: pipermerriam
content:
Portal Network in-persom summit is coming up very soon.  March 10th-11th in Berlin.

RSVP Here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeb9XZmd52OQZH0jNG68f_obh3N9_Vc5IIyFDHaL3bmLG4_4g/viewform?usp=dialog

Our focus at this event is execution client integration, though we'll also be covering more broad Portal Network topics.  One RSVP per team please.
